import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {doc,} from 'firebase/firestore'; // import { db } from '../firebase'; import { db } from '../firebase'; import {getDocs, collection, updateDoc} from 'firebase/firestore'; const SuperAdmin = ({selectedCardData,button1,button2,display}) => { const handleUpdate = async () => { try { const docRef = doc(db,"users",selectedCardData.id); await updateDoc(docRef,{ isVerified:'verified' }) // const userRef = await db.collection('users').doc(selectedCardData.id); // Update specific fields using set with merge option alert("verified successfully") // You can also update the local state if needed // Example: setSelectedCardData({ ...selectedCardData, name: 'New Name', email: 'new.email@example.com' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error during update:', error); } }; return ( <>
{selectedCardData && (

{selectedCardData.Verified}

Name

{selectedCardData.firstName}

Contact

{selectedCardData.phone}

Email

{selectedCardData.email}

Relegion

{selectedCardData.religion}

Nationality

{selectedCardData.nationality}

Hometown

{selectedCardData.address}

Study

{selectedCardData.studyPlace}

Job Title

{selectedCardData.jobTitle}

Workplace

{selectedCardData.workPlace}

DOB

{selectedCardData.dob}

Gender

{selectedCardData.gender}

Height

{selectedCardData.height}

ID

{selectedCardData.id}

Other documents
)}
) } export default SuperAdmin
